item.title: US President Donald Trump said there's no deal until there's a deal, adding that “great progress” had been made following talks on Ukraine with Russian President Vladimir Putin. #DonaldTrump #Putin #Ukraine #WorldNews #BreakingNews#Alaska #BBCNews
